00034 namespace pwiz {
00035 namespace msdata {
00036 
00037 
00038 /// SpectrumList filter, for creating Spectrum sub-lists
00039 class PWIZ_API_DECL SpectrumListFilter : public SpectrumList
00040 {
00041     public:
00042 
00043     /// client-implemented filter predicate -- called during construction of
00044     /// SpectrumListFilter to create the filtered list of spectra
00045     struct PWIZ_API_DECL Predicate
00046     {
00047         /// return values:
00048         ///  true: accept the Spectrum
00049         ///  false: reject the Spectrum
00050         ///  indeterminate: need to see the full Spectrum object to decide
00051         virtual boost::logic::tribool accept(const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const 
00052         {return false;} 
00053 
00054         /// return true iff Spectrum is accepted
00055         virtual bool accept(const Spectrum& spectrum) const {return false;} 
00056 
00057         /// return true iff done accepting spectra; 
00058         /// this allows early termination of the iteration through the original
00059         /// SpectrumList, possibly using assumptions about the order of the
00060         /// iteration (e.g. index is increasing, nativeID interpreted as scan number is
00061         /// increasing, ...)
00062         virtual bool done() const {return false;} 
00063 
00064         virtual ~Predicate() {}
00065     };
00066 
00067     SpectrumListFilter(const SpectrumListPtr original, const Predicate& predicate);
00068 
00069     /// \name SpectrumList interface
00070     //@{
00071     virtual size_t size() const;
00072     virtual const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity(size_t index) const;
00073     virtual SpectrumPtr spectrum(size_t index, bool getBinaryData = false) const;
00074     //@}
00075 
00076     private:
00077     struct Impl;
00078     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00079     SpectrumListFilter(SpectrumListFilter&);
00080     SpectrumListFilter& operator=(SpectrumListFilter&);
00081 };
00082 
00083 
00084 class PWIZ_API_DECL SpectrumListFilterPredicate_IndexSet : public SpectrumListFilter::Predicate
00085 {
00086     public:
00087     SpectrumListFilterPredicate_IndexSet(const pwiz::util::IntegerSet& indexSet);
00088     virtual boost::logic::tribool accept(const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const;
00089     virtual bool done() const;
00090 
00091     private:
00092     pwiz::util::IntegerSet indexSet_;
00093     mutable bool eos_;
00094 };
00095 
00096

00098 {
00099     public:
00100     SpectrumListFilterPredicate_ScanNumberSet(const pwiz::util::IntegerSet& scanNumberSet);
00101     virtual boost::logic::tribool accept(const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const;
00102     virtual bool done() const;
00103 
00104     private:
00105     pwiz::util::IntegerSet scanNumberSet_;
00106     mutable bool eos_;
00107 };
